segments.text: This kitchen is turning into a total disaster area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying that plate, but ignoring the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is splashing everywhere from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the cabinets and creating a gross puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in it, and she doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby could get ruined too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy is messing with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Climbing on that flimsy stool like it's nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's probably dropping crumbs all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, begging for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies is such a messy habit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole floor will be sticky soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the nice garden view can't salvage this sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this unclean chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
